00023 #ifndef _CTK_SPE_TASK_COMMON_H
00024 #define _CTK_SPE_TASK_COMMON_H
00025 
00026 #include "ctk_types.h"
00027 
00028 #ifdef __cplusplus
00029 extern "C" {
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 #ifndef CTK_SPE_TASK_START_ADDR
00033 #define CTK_SPE_TASK_START_ADDR  0x80
00034 #endif /* !CTK_SPE_TASK_START_ADDR */
00035 
00036 #define CTK_SPE_TASK_LS_SIZE  (LS_SIZE - CTK_SPE_TASK_START_ADDR + 0x80)
00037 
00038 #include "ctk_spe_task_status.h"
00039 
00043 typedef ea_addr_t ctk_spe_task_ea_t;
00044 
00048 typedef struct {
00049     unsigned int counter;
00050     unsigned int magic;
00051     ea_addr_t load_image;
00052     ls_addr_t entry;
00053     ls_addr_t load_addr;
00054     ls_addr_t load_size;
00055     char pad[0] __attribute__((aligned(16)));
00056 /* 32 bytes */
00057 } ctk_spe_task_image_body_t;
00058 
00059 typedef ctk_spe_task_image_body_t *ctk_spe_task_image_t;
00060 
00061 #define CTK_SPE_TASK_IMAGE_MAGIC        0xbaba1234
00062 
00066 typedef struct ctk_spe_task_info {
00067     ea_addr_t next;             // next
00068     ea_addr_t task;             // self
00069     ea_addr_t text;             // text area
00070     ls_addr_t load_addr;
00071     ls_addr_t load_size;
00072 /* 32 bytes */
00073     ls_addr_t entry;
00074     ls_addr_t data_end;
00075     ctk_uint16_t stack_size;
00076     ctk_uint8_t lock:1;
00077     ctk_uint8_t flag:3;
00078     volatile ctk_uint8_t status:4;
00079     ctk_val128_t rc __attribute__((aligned(16)));
00080 /* 64 bytes */
00081     ctk_uint16_t id;
00082     ctk_uint64_t arg[2];
00083     ea_addr_t class_ea;
00084 } __attribute__((aligned(128))) ctk_spe_task_info_t;
00085 
00089 typedef struct {
00090     unsigned char ls[CTK_SPE_TASK_LS_SIZE] __attribute__((aligned(128)));
00091     unsigned int gprs[4][128] __attribute__((aligned(128)));
00092 } ctk_spe_task_save_t __attribute__((aligned(128)));
00093 
00096 #define CTK_SPE_TASK_SAVE              0x0001
00097 
00100 #define CTK_SPE_TASK_ADD_ACCESS_HINT   0x0002
00101 
00104 #define CTK_SPE_TASK_DETACHED          0x0004
00105 
00106 #ifdef __cplusplus
00107 };
